title: CREATE: Cosmic Ray Experimental Apparatus for TEaching
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The cosmic ray muon detectors have been delivered to schools and have had impact in teaching at those locations. Education
findingsText: Cosmic ray muon detectors were constructed and deployed in 2 schools in the North East of England as teaching aids. The design of our cosmic ray detector for education has been subsequently copied for further outreach activity, e.g. at Boulby mine Education
